nodes.text: Around 3640 BBY a guild on Sarkhai asked the Sarkhai representative in the Galactic Senate Nadia Grell for permission from the Galactic Republic to demolish the Annex of Kespan, the oldest ruin on the planet, and build a new spaceport on its site.

The Sarkhai guild is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Nadia Grell companion storyline. The decision on whether to preserve or demolish the ruin is made by the player, who suggests the solution to Nadia.
